In 2022, Axon announced our moonshot goal to cut gun-related deaths between police and the public in the United States in half by 2033 . Axon is building the public safety operating system of the future by integrating a suite of hardware devices and cloud software solutions that not only revolutionize modern policing but also cater to federal agencies, corrections, justice and enterprise security needs .
 Software and Sensors segment includes sale of sensors, including body cameras, in-car cameras, other hardware sensors, warranties on sensors, and other products . The TASER segment includes the manufacture and sale of CEDs, batteries, accessories and extended warranties . Axon employees are distributed across multiple geographies and report to work via a remote-hybrid model, which leverages both in-person collaboration environments as well as cloud-based software tools .
 Axon is building a suite of cloud-based, Software-as-a-Service (“SaaS”) solutions that integrate with our sensors and TASER devices to benefit customers and drive annual recurring revenue . Product categories within sensors include Axon Body cameras, Axon Fleet in-car systems, drones and robotics .
 Axon VR solutions make public safety training more accessible, relevant and affordable . TASER devices are the most effective less-than-lethal force option, with the lowest likelihood of injury to officers and assailants . The majority of our revenues are generated via direct sales, including our online store, although we do leverage distribution partners and third-party resellers .
 Manufacturers continue to diversify their supply chain and global manufacturing footprint . Material availability has mostly stabilized from prior supply chain challenges . Supplier decommitments remain a top concern . We proactively manage our supply chain down to the level of risk . We have continued to maintain both our ISO 9001 and our ISO9001:2015 certifications .
 In light of our broad domestic and international supplier base, we are continuously monitoring our supply chain to manage through potential impacts . We are working with foreign regulators to ensure that our suppliers can provide high quality parts . These actions align to our strategic model to help meet strong product demand while also preparing us to stagger factory work schedules as needed .
 The company offers both limited and extended manufacturer’s warranties on our Axon devices and CEDs . As of December 31, 2024, we hold over 330 U.S. patents, over 150 US registered trademarks, over 270 international patents and over 460 international registered trademarks . We have the exclusive rights to many Internet domain names, including “Axon.com,” “Evidence.com” and “TASER.com .
 The market for software solutions to improve public safety agency workflows is both highly fragmented and highly competitive . We have identified more than 50 software providers, including 365Labs, Beacon Software Solutions Inc., Caliber Public Safety (parent, Harris Computer Sy Sy) and Axon Fusus: The RMS vertical area is competitive and highly fragmented .
 Axon Fusus offering competes with real-time operations platforms that ingest body camera video feeds, like Genetec's Citigraf and Motorola’s CommandCentral Aware . The AI-enabled report narrative drafting space is relatively new but fast growing . Not all law enforcement agencies use software for report writing — some still use paper .
 Axxon Air: Our end-to-end drone management software platform competes with a select set of companies in the space who offer drone programs and flight management software solutions . Axo Air: Competition in this space includes Auterion Ltd., BRINC Drones’ LiveOps, Flock Safety’s Aerodome, Motorola Solutions’ CAPE, Paladin Drones' Watchtower and Votix, LLC, among others .
 The counter drone space is fast growing and very fragmented . Dedrone competes with Advanced Protection Systems, Anduril, ApolloShield, ARTSys360, Aselsan, Belgian Advanced Technology Systems, Big Bang Boom Solutions, Bligther Surveillance Systems, BlueHalo, BSS Holland, CACI, Cerbair, Chess Dynamics, Department 13, D-Fend, DroneDefence, Droneshield, Dynamite Global Strategies, DZYNE Technologies, EDGE, EdgeSource, Elbit Systems, ESG, Fortem Technologies, FN Herstal, General Atomics, L3 Harris, Leidos, Leonardo DRS, LiveLink Aerospace, Marduk, MBDA, MC2 Technologies, and Thales .
 TASER devices offer advanced technology, versatility, portability, effectiveness, built-in accountability systems and low injury rates . They also offer connectivity to our cloud network, which allows law enforcement agencies and other professional users to more effectively manage their less-than-lethal programs and automate use-of-force reporting . The key competitive factors in this product category include a device’s accuability with existing security and defense ecosystems .
 In the private citizen space, TASER devices compete with firearms and other less-than-lethal self-defense options such as stun guns and pepper spray-based products . The broader market for personal safety and home defense is far-reaching . Other competitive factors include a device’s cost, effectiveness, safety, ease of use, and available training options .
 Historical seasonal patterns, municipal budgets and product introductions should not be considered reliable indicators of our future net sales or financial performance . Municipal law enforcement budgets tend to feature a mix of fiscal years that end in either June, September or December, while U.S. federal budget year end is in September . A number of federal and state legislative proposals in the United States could impose new obligations in areas affecting our business .
